dtliExcerpt: Cranston's performance is a master class in character embodiment, capturing Johnson's crude magnetism and political cunning with startling authenticity.
bwwExcerpt: Portraying America's 36th chief executive, Lyndon Baines Johnson, in Robert Schenkkan's democratic procedural drama "All the Way," Cranston proves so effortlessly captivating that you could imagine pulling a lever for him - or even contributing generously to whatever campaign war chest he trots out....
